text: man-yag geudae dul(hapeussawa aisya)i hananimkke nwiuchindamyeon geudae dul-ui ma-eum-eun imi giul-eojyeossdoda. man-yag geudae dul-i geu(seonjija)e daehanghayeo seololeul dobneundamyeon hananim geubun-iyamallo geuui gahojaisimyeo gabeulielgwa seonlyanghan sin-ang-indeuldo machangajila. ppunman anila cheonsadeuldo (geuui) jolyeogjala
